channel.title: Conection error
channel.description:
THIS IS AT MTP V2 SOURCE AND CLIENT Well i portforwarded everything right (canyouseeme.org) but my friend cant logon he got this error (this is at the loading bar) 'Requesting title screen' 'Conection error - Retrying in 10
How do i fix this????

item.title: Conection error

item.description:
@Niv3k wrote:

THIS IS AT MTP V2 SOURCE AND CLIENT
Well i portforwarded everything right (canyouseeme.org) but my friend cant logon he got this error
(this is at the loading bar)
‘Requesting title screen’
